What we do

Exceeding Expectations in Recoveries and Customer Service for 27 Years with an unwavering commitment, we consistently surpass our clients’ expectations in recoveries and customer service. Our mission is to provide a service that enhances our clients’ reputation with their valued customers.

Focused on compliance in today’s recovery environment, our PCE (Positive Consumer Experience) program is built on the principle of “Assume a Positive Intent” in all communications. Through a proactive consulting approach and in-depth analysis of each consumer’s unique situation, we offer realistic solutions that maximize opportunities for our clients.

Synergetic Communications goal remains constant to help clients:

  • Reduce operating expenses
  • Increase Cash Flow
  • Improve Customer Experience

Our Believers

This is an attempt to collect a debt by a debt collector. Any information obtained will be used for that purpose.

New York City Customers: As required by the New York City Department of Consumer Affairs, we kindly ask you to provide your language preference for reporting purposes. Synergetic Communication, Inc. currently offers language access and translation services for Spanish, including English. Please note that these services are provided orally and not in written form.

For translations and explanations of commonly used debt collection terms in multiple languages, please visitwww.nyc.gov/dca.

When speaking with our agent, kindly inform us of your preferred language. Your satisfaction is our priority.
